name: CaveBox
description:
☠️WARNING☠️: The game contains jumpscares

CaveBox is a short horror text adventure set in a misterious cave

Explore eerie locations and discover the secret of a weird box found at the entrance.

LANGUAGES:

  • English
  • Italiano
  • (if you want to help adding another language, send me a DM)

CONTROLS

  • MOUSE: for everything
  • ESC: close the game
  • ALT + ENTER: switch fullscreen

#adventure #puzzle #creepy
